content: On the TV show 'Star Trek', where did Captain Kirk and his crew spend most of their time?

Captain Kirk and his crew spent most of their time aboard the starship USS Enterprise. This was a fictional starship in the original "Star Trek" TV series created by Gene Roddenberry. The Enterprise was a Constitution-class vessel, registry number NCC-1701, and it served as the primary setting for the show's adventures in space exploration and diplomacy.
